activities: Our business entails the engineering, design and manufacture of electrical distribution systems. Our human resources team manages our global staff centrally, which includes members of our European team. Some personnel information maybe stored within the US, and as such, requires we protect this information in accordance with the Safe Harbor regulations. We also manage relationships with customers and suppliers throughout Europe and similar  information pertinent to our suppliers and / or customers will require the same level of protection.
eucountries: Estonia, Finland, Germany, Lithuania, Poland, United Kingdom
